about_the_game:
Adventure is waiting!

Dive into the heart of the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of Primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos and synergies to discover the truth about the mysterious Rift. 

Defeat Powerful Bosses

In the Primal Fray demo, you will face two powerful enemies: the Elder Hortensius and the ice dragon Lady Maestitia. Will you be able to outsmart them? Or perhaps build the perfect team to bring them down? The possibilities are endless, but one thing is certain... it WON'T be easy.

Choose Your Way

You will have to make difficult choices, deciding between adding a new Primal to a roster, getting an enchantment, a team heal, currency or visiting a merchant. Plan your way through the Rift and make the most out of the choices given to you.

Visit new bioms

In the demo, you will explore three distinct biomes: The Ancient Groove, The Sorrow Valley, and the Ironclad Training Facility each featuring different Primals and unique settings.

Local PvP

Primal Fray demo offers a local PVP hot seat mode, where two players can engage in strategic turn-based battles on custom maps with drafted teams.

Primal Fray

Primal Fray demo is just the beginning of the journey! Dive into an epic adventure with Primal Fray, filled with battles, bosses, and challenges. Fight your way through the Rift and be the first one to uncover all its secrets! Visit the Primal Fray Steam page and add it to your wishlist today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10*
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Since 1 January 2024, the Steam client no longer runs on anything below Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Primal Fray demo is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built team to learn the truth about the Rift.
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
